hazma.charged_kaon.decay_spectra¶

hazma.charged_kaon.decay_spectra(eng_gam, eng_k)¶

Compute dNdE from charged kaon decay.

Compute dNdE from decay of charged kaon through K -> X in the laboratory frame given a gamma ray engergy of eng_gam and charged kaon energy of eng_k. The decay modes impemendted are * k -> mu + nu * k -> pi + pi0 * k -> pi + pi + pi * k -> pi0 + e + nu * k -> pi0 + mu + nu * k -> pi + pi0 + pi0

Returns:

spec : np.ndarray

List of gamma ray spectrum values, dNdE, evaluated at eng_gams given muon energy eng_mu.
